metadata.Name: HeadlineCause
metadata.Description: HeadlineCause is a dataset of news headlines annotated for causal relations. It contains 16,289 headlines with 33,191 causal annotations.
metadata.Paper Title: HeadlineCause: A Dataset of News Headlines for Detecting Causalities
metadata.Abstract: Detecting causal relations is a fundamental task in natural language processing. Existing datasets for causal relation extraction primarily focus on scientific texts or require extensive manual annotation. In this paper, we present HeadlineCause, a large-scale dataset of news headlines annotated for causal relations. The dataset contains 16,289 headlines with 33,191 causal annotations. We also propose a simple yet effective baseline model based on pre-trained language models and demonstrate its effectiveness on the dataset. The dataset and code are publicly available at https://github.com/jason-ren/HeadlineCause.
